ch0080_09_yamaotoko/2701_0701_01_10:
We hikers are masters of climbing to ever-greater
heights—even if there’s no mountain to climb!
ch0080_09_yamaotoko/2701_0701_02_10: So I figured, I’ll just climb the Pokémon Center!
ch0080_09_yamaotoko/2701_0701_03_10:
Don’t you try it, though! The three cute sisters will
get mad at you if you do!
ch0080_09_yamaotoko/2701_0701_04_10: I should know! They already yelled at me!
